channel.title: PvM / PVP 317
channel.description:
Hello, I want to make a PvM and a PVP type of server that is 317. I know that you guys are thinking that it's just another boring 317 server but I want to make this one unique. I want to make a bossing system that no other server has seen before. I want to make the server fun instead of just training and getting rich. I just can't do it alone. I will most likely not release the server to the public (change of mind may come). I just want to do this for the experience.
I AM LOOKING FOR NEW PROGRAMMERS I want to work together with people who are not experienced. It is fun because we'll be learning and that is watch the project is also about. Having one professional programmer watch us every once in awhile would be helpful though. I also have very little experience in Java so I still have a lot to learn.
If you're interested in joining, you will have to follow these rules. 1. Agree on our decisions. 2. Stay active (I'm not talking about weekdays, i'm talking about weekends.) 3. Work together for at least an hour. 4. Have fun, chill out, relax, and laugh.
Application form: Skype: First Language: Age: Are you experienced in Java:
I will be taking about 2-4 programmers. Nothing has been decided yet (no source, name, etc). If you're a professional programmer and will be willing to take some time to watch over us, use the same application as above.
Sorry if this post is also bad, I just joined the forums. :D

item.title: PvM / PVP 317
item.dc:creator: @quikbr quikbr
item.description:
@quikbr wrote:

Hello, I want to make a PvM and a PVP type of server that is 317. I know that you guys are thinking that it’s just another boring 317 server but I want to make this one unique. I want to make a bossing system that no other server has seen before. I want to make the server fun instead of just training and getting rich. I just can’t do it alone. I will most likely not release the server to the public (change of mind may come). I just want to do this for the experience.

I AM LOOKING FOR NEW PROGRAMMERS
I want to work together with people who are not experienced. It is fun because we’ll be learning and that is watch the project is also about. Having one professional programmer watch us every once in awhile would be helpful though. I also have very little experience in Java so I still have a lot to learn.

If you’re interested in joining, you will have to follow these rules.

  1. Agree on our decisions.
  2. Stay active (I’m not talking about weekdays, i’m talking about weekends.)
  3. Work together for at least an hour.
  4. Have fun, chill out, relax, and laugh.

Application form:
Skype:
First Language:
Age:
Are you experienced in Java:

I will be taking about 2-4 programmers. Nothing has been decided yet (no source, name, etc). If you’re a professional programmer and will be willing to take some time to watch over us, use the same application as above.

Sorry if this post is also bad, I just joined the forums.
